#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<cstring>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<climits>

#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long

using namespace std;
ll gcd(ll a,ll b) {if(b==0) return a; return gcd(b,a%b);}

ll power(ll b,ll exp,ll m)
 {ll ans=1;
  b%=m;
  while(exp)
   {if(exp&1)
     ans=(ans*b)%m;
    exp>>=1;
	b=(b*b)%m;
   }
  return ans;
 }
int prime[2000];
int main()
{
  prime[1]=prime[2]=0;
  for(int i=2;i<=1000;i++)
  {
        if(prime[i]==0)
        {
            for(int j=2;j*i<=1000;j++)
            prime[i*j]=1;
        }
   }
   int k=28;
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int sum=0;
        for(int i=k;i<=n;i++)
        if(prime[i]==0)
        sum+=i;
        
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }


//getch();
return 0;
/*checklist
1)getch() and conio.h removed.*/
}
